title: Privacy Policy
introduction: At Elitas Clinic, your privacy is very important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our services, visit our clinic, or access our website.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We may collect the following types of information:

items.description: Name, NRIC/passport number, date of birth, gender, contact details (phone number, email address, home address).
Health history, medical records, treatment details, prescriptions, and other information necessary for your care.
Bank details, payment method, insurance details (if applicable).
IP address, browser type, pages visited, and cookies for site improvement and analytics.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
items: To provide you with safe, accurate, and effective medical care.
To manage appointments, reminders, and follow-ups.
To process payments, insurance claims, or billing.
To improve our services and website experience.
To comply with medical, legal, and regulatory requirements.
To communicate important updates, promotions, or health tips (with your consent).

sections.title: 3. How We Protect Your Information
sections.content: We take strict measures to safeguard your personal information, including:
items: Secure storage of physical medical records.
Use of encryption and password protection for electronic records.
Limiting access to personal data only to authorized staff.
Regular system monitoring and staff training on confidentiality.

sections.title: 4. Sharing of Information
sections.content: We do not sell or trade your personal data. However, we may share information in the following situations:

items.description: who support our clinic operations (e.g., IT, payment gateways).

sections.note: All third parties are required to keep your data confidential and use it only for agreed purposes.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Access and request a copy of your personal data.
Withdraw consent to certain uses of your data (subject to legal/medical limitations).
Request deletion of your data where applicable.

sections.title: 6. Cookies and Website Tracking
sections.content: Our website may use cookies and analytics tools to improve user experience. You can adjust your browser settings to refuse cookies, but some features of the site may not function properly.

sections.title: 7. Data Retention
sections.content: We will retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill medical, legal, and operational requirements. When no longer needed, data will be securely disposed of or anonymized.

sections.title: 8. Updates to this Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with a revised "Last Updated" date.

sections.title: 9. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or how your information is handled, please contact us:
